        sliderHeadLength=
      • sliderHeadLength=(gui: GuiElement; val: int)
  Source   Edit

Defines a slider, like the regular audio volume slider in settings.

Slice-9 for the slider track will be rendered as a slice-3, i.e. only the top and bottom parts will be used, without the middle one.

Sliders can be discrete and continuous. Discrete sliders can have values from 0 to count (not inclusive), so if count is 10, then the slider will have 10 possible values: from 0 to 9. Continuous sliders always have values from 0 to 1.

Imports

../ecs, ../helpers, ../primitives, ../../utils, ../../resources
